name: You Are Liam
description:
You Are Liam is a short, psychological, puzzle horror game that is a sequel to a previous game of mine, This is Miranda.

Come to terms with who you really are. You are Liam.

GAMEPLAY:

You Are Liam involves looping to solve some puzzles and progress through the game. When I originally made This is Miranda, PT was an inspiration I had in mind, which has carried over into this game.

EXTRA NOTES:

If you find any bugs, be sure to report them in the comments and I'll fix them in a future update if needed.

REMEMBER: This is a horror game. It contains jumpscares and loud sounds. Play at your own risk.

There are two languages: English and Japanese. If you find any mistakes with the Japanese translations, be sure to let me know.
